version_description: We've updated the data for all WoT versions: PC 0.9.17.1, Blitz 3.6, Console 3.5. Unfortunately we don't have models for some new Blitz French tanks and we'll update the app as soon as we get them.

We've updated the data for all WoT versions: PC 0.9.18, Blitz 3.8, Console 3.6.

NEW : we added a blitz style hitskin!
Some differences with the game hitskin:
• Blitz shows penetration chances above 66% in green, as if it was a 100% sure pen, without any red skin. It's trollish and we show a sure pen only above 95%
• Blitz doesn't account for the influence of external parts on penetration (tracks, space armor...) and shows decoration as a sure pen, even where it make no damage. We show all zero damage area in red.
The previous update misses the proper blitz and PC data.
Blitz 3.9 data update. Fixed issue when your purchases are not being active when the app starts.

We've updated the data for all WoT versions: PC 0.9.19.1, Blitz 4.0, Console 3.9.
Unfortunately, we don't have yet models for new blitz TDs. We'll update the app as soon as we get the data.
- fixed bug related to incorrect shot simulation position in confrontation mode

We've updated the data: PC 0.9.20, Blitz 4.2.
All collision and visual models have been updated for blitz tanks.
There are also new blitz HD textures. Check it out!
We've updated the data: PC 0.9.20.1, Blitz 4.3. Console 4.1.

data update pc 9.20.1.1
bugfixes
fixed minor bugs
blitz 4.4 tanks, console data update
Updated data: PC 0.9.21, Blitz 4.5. Fixed some issues related to absence of blitz guns on the models.
small fixes
blitz 4.6 data update, using new penetration rules on blitz.

We've updated the data: PC 1.0.0, Blitz 4.7. WG has changed format of collision models on PC and didn't provide any specifications. We managed to understand how data is stored, but not for all models. We apologize that some models on PC are broken or have missed guns.
pc 9.22, console 4.3 data update

We've updated the data: PC 1.0.0, Blitz 4.7. WG has changed format of collision models on PC and didn't provide any specifications. We managed to understand how data is stored, but not for all models. We apologize that some models on PC are broken or have missed guns.
We've updated the data: PC 1.0.1, Blitz 4.9, Console 4.4. PC collision models are more precise and cleaner now.

• new Armor Inspector Mod for WoT PC! works offline in your WoT garage, allows to see collision models, pen chances and shots from your last battle. check "shots" button on the right to get the installation instructions (only for PC).
